faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does it protect my credits from AI?
faq.a1: Our system has a double-layer security engine. The first filter stops known jailbreak attempts instantly without querying OpenAI. The second analyzes AI responses; if it detects a violation, it permanently blocks the user's IP.
faq.q2: Is the WhatsApp redirection really automatic?
faq.a2: Yes. Once the AI qualifies the lead and gets their confirmation, the browser automatically opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message containing the client's name and request. You don't have to copy or paste anything.
faq.q3: What if I block a client by mistake?
faq.a3: In your Dashboard, you have a 'Security' tab where you can see the history of blocked IPs and the reason. You can unlock any user with a single click.
faq.q4: Is it compatible with my website?
faq.a4: It is 100% compatible. You just need to copy a line of <script> code before closing the </body> of your site. Works on WordPress (Elementor/Divi), Shopify, Wix, React, and pure HTML.
